conversation_history.content: Could you please describe the symptoms you are experiencing?
Yes, my head hurts when I look up.
How long have you been experiencing this headache, and is it constant or does it come and go?
On a scale from 1 to 10, how would you rate the intensity of the headache?
Do you have any other symptoms accompanying the headache, such as nausea, vomiting, visual disturbances, or sensitivity to light?
Have you had any recent injuries to your head or neck, or have you been experiencing any stress or changes in your routine lately?

possible_next_steps: Monitor the headache and any additional symptoms.
Consider evaluating sleep hygiene and stress management.
If the headache persists or worsens, consult a healthcare professional.
summary: The patient is experiencing a headache that intensifies when looking up.
The headache has persisted for 2 days.
The intensity of the headache is rated as 8 out of 10.
There are no accompanying symptoms such as nausea or visual disturbances.
The patient reports no recent injuries or significant stressors.
